@graph.description: Fun food for holidays and special occasions featuring chocolate recipes, decorated cakes, cute cupcakes, and homemade candy.

@graph.name: Cheesecake Ghosts make fun desserts for Halloween
@graph.description: Turn delicious mini cheesecakes into cute ghosts for Halloween by adding candy eyes and a sprinkle mouth. These fun holiday desserts are sure to disappear!

@graph.name: Beth
@graph.description: Beth Jackson Klosterboer is a professional chocolatier and party planner turned food blogger who is passionate about creating fun food, edible crafts, kid's treats and recipes for holidays and special occasions.

@graph.name: Cheesecake Ghosts
@graph.description: Bite-sized cheesecake ghosts decorated with candy eyes are fun desserts for Halloween.
recipeIngredient: butter, (to coat the inside of your molds)
16 ounces cream cheese, (softened (do not use low fat or no-fat cream cheese))
18-22  black confetti sprinkles (or mini chocolate chips

recipeInstructions.text: Butter the cavities in your molds.
recipeInstructions.name: Butter the cavities in your molds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add sugar and beat until light and fluffy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add sugar and beat until light and fluffy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add heavy whipping cream, eggs, and vanilla and beat just to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Add heavy whipping cream, eggs, and vanilla and beat just to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Set brownie pop molds on a baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Set brownie pop molds on a baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill 18-22 brownie pop cavities with cheesecake filling.
recipeInstructions.name: Fill 18-22 brownie pop cavities with cheesecake filling.

recipeInstructions.text: Allow them to cool at room temperature for one hour, then freeze them for at least 3 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Allow them to cool at room temperature for one hour, then freeze them for at least 3 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: Un-mold them onto small dessert plates.
recipeInstructions.name: Un-mold them onto small dessert plates.

@graph.keywords: baby cheesecake, cheesecake ghost, halloween desserts
